properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER VALUES(SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
select MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_NM, PHONE, GENDER, HIRE_DT from Tb_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PW = ? AND SCSN_FL = 'N'
SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_NM, PHONE, GENDER, HIRE_DT FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_NM LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND SCSN_FL = 'N'
SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_NM, SUBSTR(PHONE, INSTR(PHONE, '-', -1)+1) PHONE, GENDER FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE GENDER = ? AND SCSN_FL = 'N'
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET MEM_NM = ?, PHONE = ?, GENDER = ? WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET MEM_PW = ? WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND MEM_PW = ? AND SCSN_FL = 'N'
